spirit:addressBlock.spirit:name: some_register_map
spirit:addressBlock.spirit:description: This address map contains some example registers to show how RDL can be utilized in various situations.

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_CC_CP
spirit:register.spirit:description: CP Clock Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_RD_ST_CLEAR
spirit:field.spirit:description: rd_st clear cp_rd_status can be cleared by writing logic high on this bit.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ACLK_DYN_FC15
spirit:field.spirit:description: dynamic aclk clock change writing this bit will change the bus clock without going through the core idle, memory controller idle process

spirit:field.spirit:name: DCLK_DYN_FC16
spirit:field.spirit:description: dynamic dclk clock change writing this bit will change the bus clock without going through the core idle, memory controller idle process

spirit:field.spirit:name: CORE_DYN_FC
spirit:field.spirit:description: dynamic core clock change writing this bit will change the core clock without going through the core idle, memory controller idle process

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_ALLOW_SPD_CHG
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: comm> speed change voting 1 = <var processor: comm> allows frequency change

spirit:field.spirit:name: BUS_FREQ_CHG_REQ19
spirit:field.spirit:description: aclk frequency change request. write 1 to vote frequency change.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DDR_FREQ_CHG_REQ20
spirit:field.spirit:description: dclk frequency change request. write 1 to vote frequency change

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_FREQ_CHG_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: comm> frequency change request. write 1 to vote frequency change.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC522
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap bus interface sync with bus clock 1 = async must set to async

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC423
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp bus interface sync with bus interface 1 = async this field must be set to async.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC3_124
spirit:field.spirit:description: axi bus interface sync with ddr controller 1 = async this field must be set to async.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC325
spirit:field.spirit:description: axi bus interface sync with ddr clock 1 = async this field must be set to async.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC226
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap bus interface sync with ddr clock 1 = async this field must be set to async.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC127
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp bus interface sync with ddr clock 1 = async this field must be set to async.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BUS_CLK_DIV28
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for aclk, aclk = <aclk_selection> in fccr/ (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: DDR_CLK_DIV29
spirit:field.spirit:description: pll1 clock divider configuration for dclk when fcdclk dclksel is not 3'b00x, dclk source is pll2, pll3, pll4 or pll1_1248 and the divider is bypassed. when dclksel is 3'b00x, pll1_832 or pll1_624 is selected. dclk = <dclk_selection> in fcdclk/ (this fie

spirit:field.spirit:name: CORE_CLK_DIV31
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for pclk of <var processor: comm>, pclk = (<var processor: comm> core clock selection in fccr) / (this field +1)

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_CC_AP
spirit:register.spirit:description: AP Clock Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_RD_ST_CLEAR
spirit:field.spirit:description: rd_st clear ap_rd_status can be cleared by writing logic high on this bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C2_DYN_FC
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster2 dynamic clock change writing this bit will change the core clock without going through the core idle, memory controller idle process

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C2_FREQ_CHG_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster2 frequency change request, the c2_clk_div and c2_aclk div is in pmu_cc3_ap register, should configure it before enable this bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: ACLK_DYN_FC42
spirit:field.spirit:description: dynamic aclk clock change writing this bit will change the bus clock without going through the core idle, memory controller idle process

spirit:field.spirit:name: DCLK_DYN_FC43
spirit:field.spirit:description: dynamic dclk clock change writing this bit will change the bus clock without going through the core idle, memory controller idle process

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C1_DYN_FC
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster1 dynamic clock change writing this bit will change the core clock without going through the core idle, memory controller idle process

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C0_DYN_FC
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster0 dynamic clock change writing this bit will change the core clock without going through the core idle, memory controller idle process

spirit:field.spirit:name: BUS_FREQ_CHG_REQ46
spirit:field.spirit:description: aclk frequency change request

spirit:field.spirit:name: DDR_FREQ_CHG_REQ47
spirit:field.spirit:description: dclk frequency change request

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C1_FREQ_CHG_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster1 frequency change request

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C0_FREQ_CHG_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster0 frequency change request

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_ALLOW_SPD_CHG
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap speed change voting

spirit:field.spirit:name: BUS_CLK_DIV52
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for aclk, aclk = <aclk_selection> in fcaclk/ (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: DDR_CLK_DIV53
spirit:field.spirit:description: pll1 clock divider configuration for dclk when fcdclk dclksel is not 3'b00x, dclk source is pll2, pll3, pll4 or pll1_1248 and the divider is bypassed. when dclksel is 3'b00x, pll1_832 or pll1_624 is selected. dclk = <dclk_selection> in fcdclk/ (this field +1).

spirit:field.spirit:name: C1_ACLK_DIV54
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for cluster1 axi interface clock c1_aclk is divided from pclk. c1_aclk= pclk / (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: C1_CLK_DIV55
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for cluster1 pclk. if (fcap.c1_pllsel<=3), pclk= (fcap.c1_pllsel selectin clock )/(c1_clk_div +1); else pclk =fcap.c1_pllsel selectin clock

spirit:field.spirit:name: C0_ACLK_DIV56
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for cluster0 axi interface clock c0_aclk is divided from pclk. c0_aclk= pclk / (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: C0_CLK_DIV57
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for cluster0 pclk. if (fcap.c0_pllsel<=3), pclk= (fcap.c0_pllsel selectin clock )/(c0_clk_div +1); else pclk =fcap.c0_pllsel selectin clock

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_DM_CC_CP
spirit:register.spirit:description: Dummy CP Clock Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_AP_C2_FC_DONE64
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap frequency change done status 0x0 = frequency change is not done 0x1 = frequency change is done

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_AP_C1_FC_DONE65
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap frequency change done status 0x0 = frequency change is not done 0x1 = frequency change is done

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_ACLK_FC_DONE66
spirit:field.spirit:description: aclk frequency change done status. this bit is set when a frequency change is done while the corresponding fc_req is still in assertion.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_DCLK_FC_DONE67
spirit:field.spirit:description: dclk frequency change done status. this bit is set when a frequency change is done while the corresponding fc_req is still in assertion.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_AP_C0_FC_DONE68
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap frequency change done status. this bit is set when a frequency change is done while the corresponding fc_req is still in assertion.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_FC_DONE69
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp frequency change done status. this bit is set when a frequency change is done while the corresponding fc_req is still in assertion.

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_RD_STATUS70
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap read status indicates that the dummy ap clock register is being read by cp or ap. reading the status is the beginning of the frequency update process. if this bit is set, it indicates that one of the cores is in the frequency update process and the other core must wait until the other core clears this bit (using the <rd_st clear> field in the ap clock control register) to indicate that the frequency change process has completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_RD_STATUS71
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp read status indicates that the dummy cp clock register is being read by cp or ap. reading the status is the beginning of the frequency update process. if this bit is set, it indicates that one of the cores is in the frequency update process and the other core must wait until the other core clears this bit (using the <rd_st clear> field in the cp clock control register) to indicate that the frequency change process has completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC572
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap bus interface sync with bus clock 1 = async

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC473
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp bus interface sync with bus clock 1 = async

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC3_174
spirit:field.spirit:description: axi bus interface sync with ddr clock 1 = async

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC375
spirit:field.spirit:description: axi bus interface sync with ddr controller 1 = async

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC276
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap bus interface sync with ddr controller 1 = async

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC177
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp bus interface sync with ddr controller 1 = async

spirit:field.spirit:name: BUS_CLK_DIV78
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for aclk aclk = <aclk_selection> in fccr/ (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: DDR_CLK_DIV79
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for dclk dclk = <dclk_selection> in fccr/ (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: CORE_CLK_DIV81
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for pclk of <var processor: comm> pclk = (seagull core clock selection in fccr) / (this field +1)

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_DM_CC_AP

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_AP_C2_FC_DONE88
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap frequency change done status 0x0 = frequency change is not done 0x1 = frequency change is done

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_AP_C1_FC_DONE89
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap frequency change done status 0x0 = frequency change is not done 0x1 = frequency change is done

spirit:field.spirit:description: ap bus interface sync with bus interface

spirit:field.spirit:description: cp bus interface sync with bus interface

spirit:field.spirit:description: axi bus interface sync with ddr controller

spirit:field.spirit:description: axi bus interface sync with ddr controller

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC2100
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap bus interface sync with ddr controller

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASYNC1101
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp bus interface sync with ddr controller

spirit:field.spirit:name: BUS_CLK_DIV102
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for aclk, aclk = <aclk_selection> in fccr/ (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: C1_ACLK_DIV104

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_FC_TIMER
spirit:register.spirit:description: Frequency Change Timer Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: TIMER
spirit:field.spirit:description: frequency change timer this field defines the frequency change timer value in 26 mhz clock unit

spirit:field.spirit:name: TIMER_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: timer select this field defines the timer for applying the clock changes for cp and ap. 0x0 = ap pmu internak timer 0x1 = gsm tcu signal 0x2 = wb rtu signal

spirit:field.spirit:name: TIMER_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: timer enable this field defines the timer for frequency change sequence. 0 = timer expiration will not be required before applying the new clock divider settings 1 = timer expiration will be required before starting the clock divider settings

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_CP_IDLE_CFG
spirit:register.spirit:description: CP Idle Configuration Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: SEA_SRAM_WAIT
spirit:field.spirit:description: sram power up wait cycle sram power up counter for 20 ns this field should remain set to the default value and should not be changed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: SEA_SRAM_VMCVSSM
spirit:field.spirit:description: l1/l2 pd vmc and vssm this field lis the l1/l2 sram's pdlvmc and pdfvssm input. it should remain set to 0.

spirit:field.spirit:name: SEA_DIS_MC_SW_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: disable memory controller sw req this field is used to disable the memory controller entry to idle mode using the memory controller sleep request bits. memory controller will always enter into idle mode based on the hardware state machine request. 0 =

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_SEA_MC_WAKE_EN127
spirit:field.spirit:description: wake enable wake up the memory controller when <var processor: comm> wakes up from core idle mode. memory controller will be woken up before the interrupt to the core is released. 0 = memory controller wake disabled 1 = memory controller wake up

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_L2_PWR_SW
spirit:field.spirit:description: l2sr swh this field is the number of power switches for the l2 power. 0 = 1 power switch 1 = 2 power switches

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_L1_PWR_SW
spirit:field.spirit:description: l1sr swh this field is the number of power switches for the l1 power. 0 = 1 power switch 1 = 2 power switches

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_CORE_PWR_SW
spirit:field.spirit:description: swh this field is the number of power switches for the core power 0x0 = 1 power switch 0x1 = 2 power switches 0x2 = 3 power switches 0x3 = 4 power switches

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_DIS_L2_SLP2
spirit:field.spirit:description: disable l2 slp2 this field is used to disable the cp l1/l2 power switch sleep2 power down during core power down mode. 1 = disable cp l2 power switch sleep2

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_DIS_L2_SLP1
spirit:field.spirit:description: disable l2 slp1 this field is used to disable the cp l1/l2 power switch sleep1 power down during core power down mode. 1 = disable cp l2 power switch sleep1

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_DIS_SLP2
spirit:field.spirit:description: disable slp2 this field is used to disable the cp core power switch sleep2 power down during core power down mode. 1 = disable ap power switch sleep2

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_DIS_SLP1
spirit:field.spirit:description: disable slp1 this field is used to disable the <var processor: application> core power switch sleep1 power down during core power down mode. 1 = disable ap power switch sleep1

spirit:field.spirit:name: SEA_MASK_JTAG_IDLE
spirit:field.spirit:description: mask the jtag idle check during core idle entry for <var processor: comm> 1 = mask the jtag idle check for <var processor: comm>

spirit:field.spirit:name: SEA_L2_CLK_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: comm> l2 clock enable/disable 1 = l2 controller clock is disabled 0 = l2 controller clock is enabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: SEA_L2_RESETN
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: comm> l2 assert reset 0 = l2 controller will be in reset legacy bits only

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_L2_ISOB
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp l2 controller isolation enable 0 = isolation enable (power down mode) 1 = isolation disable (normal mode) legacy bits only

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_L2_PWR_OFF
spirit:field.spirit:description: frc l2 sram off 1 = l2 cache power will be off, but l1 cache is retained

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_SRAM_PWRDWN
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp l1+l2 cache sram power down 1 = when the core issues idle (wait for interrupt or wfi command), the core will go into deep sleep mode and sram power will be off. cpu core will auto clear l1 cache.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_PWRDWN
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp power down 1 = when core issue idle (wait for interrupt or wfi command), the core will go into deep sleep mode.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_DTCM_PDWN_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: dtcm sram pdwn control disable this field should be set to 0x0 so that tcm memory pdwn will be asserted automatically

spirit:field.spirit:name: MASK_WFI_CHECK145
spirit:field.spirit:description: debug only - it should be 0 during normal operation wfi state check mask 1 = status check masked 0 = status check not masked

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_SQU_CLK_GATE_CTRL

spirit:field.spirit:name: MP3_MODE_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = enable mp3 sleep mode. 0 = disable mp3 sleep mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_REFCLK_GATE_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = sw control enable 0 = hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_REFCLK_SW_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable in sw mode 0 = clock disable in sw mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_BANK4CLK_GATE_DIS

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_BANK4CLK_SW_EN

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_BANK3CLK_SW_EN

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_BANK2CLK_GATE_DIS

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_BANK2CLK_SW_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable in sw mode 0 = clock disable in sw mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_BANK1CLK_GATE_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = sw control enable 0 = hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_BANK1CLK_SW_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable in sw mode 0 = clock disable in sw mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_BANK0CLK_GATE_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = sw control enable 0 = hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_BANK0CLK_SW_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable in sw mode 0 = clock disable in sw mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_S8CLK_GATE_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = sw control enable 0 = hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_S8CLK_SW_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable in sw mode 0 = clock disable in sw mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_S4CLK_GATE_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = sw control enable 0 = hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_S4CLK_SW_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable in sw mode 0 = clock disable in sw mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_S1CLK_GATE_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = sw control enable 0 = hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_S1CLK_SW_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable in sw mode 0 = clock disable in sw mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_FMBISTCLK_GATE_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = sw control enable 0 = hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_FMBISTCLK_SW_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable in sw mode 0 = clock disable in sw mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_ROMCLK_GATE_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = sw control enable 0 = hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_ROMCLK_SW_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable in sw mode 0 = clock disable in sw mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_CLK_GATE_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = sw control enable 0 = hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: SQU_CLK_SW_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable in sw mode 0 = clock disable in sw mode

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_JPG_CLK_RES_CTRL
spirit:register.spirit:description: JPG Clock/Reset Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: 2K_AFBC_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 2k afbc clock enable 1 = clock enabled 0 = clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: 4K_AFBC_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 4k afbc clock enable 1 = clock enabled 0 = clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: JPG_CLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: jpg function clk fc request 1 = triggers a frequency change this field is hardware cleared when the frequency change is done.

spirit:field.spirit:name: JPG_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: jpg function clock divide ratio isp_clk = jpg_clk_div / (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: JPG_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: jpg function clock source select 0x0 = 624 mhz 0x1 = 499 mhz 0x2 = 832 0x3 = pll3_div3 0x4 = pll4_div2 0x5 = pll5_div2 0x6 = pll3_div2 0x7 = 1248mhz

spirit:field.spirit:name: JPG_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: jpg function clock enable 1 = clock enabled 0 = clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: JPG_CLK_RSTN
spirit:field.spirit:description: jpg function clock reset 0 = reset

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_CSI_CCIC2_CLK_RES_CTRL
spirit:register.spirit:description: CSI CCIC2 Clock/Reset Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCIC3_PHY_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: ccic3 phy clock select 0 = 104 mhz 1 = 52 mhz

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCIC3_PHY_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: ccic3 phy clock enable 1 = phy clock enabled 0 = phy clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCIC3_PHY_CLK_RST
spirit:field.spirit:description: ccic3 phy clock reset this clock is also used for dphy reset. 0 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: CAM_MCLK0_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: cam mclk0 enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: CAM_MCLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: cam mclk enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISIM_VCLK_OUT_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider for isim_vclk_out the source sensor reference clock is selected by [9:8]. the divider of the sensor reference clock is controlled by this register. isim_vclk_out = isim_vclk_out_div / (this field +1) the default value is 312/(11+1) = 26 mhz

spirit:field.spirit:name: CSI_FNC_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: csi controller function clock divide ratio csi_fnc_clk = csi_fnc_clk_div / (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: CSI_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: csi controller function clock source select 0x0 = pll3_div4 mhz 0x1 = pll4_div3 0x2 = 624 0x3 = pll3_div3 0x4 = 832 mhz 0x5 = pll4_div2 0x6 = pll3_div2 0x7 = pll2_div2

spirit:field.spirit:name: CSI_CLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: csi controller function clk fc request 1 = trigger frequency change this field is cleared when the fc completes.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CAM_MCLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: cam mclkselect 0 = 312 mhz 1 = pll2_div5 2 = 416mhz 3 = pll4_div5

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCIC2_PHYCLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: ccic2 phy clock select 0 = 104 mhz 1 = 52 mhz

spirit:field.spirit:name: CAM_MCLK1_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: cam mclk1 enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCIC2_PHYCLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: ccic2 phy clock enable 1 = phy clock enabled 0 = phy clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: CSI_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: csi controller function clock enable 1 = peripheral clock enabled 0 = peripheral clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCIC2_PHYCLK_RST
spirit:field.spirit:description: ccic2 phy clock reset this clock is also used for dphy reset. 0 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: CSI_CLK_RST
spirit:field.spirit:description: reset for csi controller function clock 0 = reset

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_ISP_CLK_RES_CTRL
spirit:register.spirit:description: ISP Clock/Reset Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_PDWN
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp power down control this field is active high.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_REPAIR_MEM_CTRL_TRIG
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp repairable memory control trigger 1 = triggers isp repairable memory control this register is hardware cleared when the repair to memory control is done.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_REPAIR_MEM_CTRL_DONE_BYPASS
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp repairable memory control done bypass in isp hardware mode this field is valid when the isp is in hardware mode (isp_hw_mode = 1).

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_MCU_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp mcu function clock enable 1 = clock enabled 0 = clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_MCU_CLK_RSTN
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp mcu clock reset 0 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_MCU_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp mcu clock divider 0 = 312mhz 1 = 416mhz

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_MCU_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp mcu clock divider isp_mcu_clk = clk/ (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_CI_BUS_CLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp_ci bus clock fc request 1 = triggers a frequency change this field is hardware cleared when the frequency change is done.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_CI_BUS_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp_ci bus clock select 0x0 =pll1-624 mhz 0x1 = pll1-832 mhz 0x2 = pll1-499m 0x3 = pll4_div3

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_CI_BUS_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp_ci bus clock divide ratio isp_ci_divided_bus_clk = isp_ci_bus_clk / (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_CI_BUS_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp_ci bus clk enable this field is the dma clk enable for ccic and isp. it controls the first level axi clock gating for ccic and isp. the second level axi clock gating for ccic and isp each have separate gating control registers.< p>1 = clock enabled<

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_CI_BUS_CLK_RST
spirit:field.spirit:description:
isp_ci bus clk reset 0 = reset

this reset will reset all the axi logic in sc2 expect isp axi logic

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_HW_MODE
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp hardware on/off control mode 1 = hardware controls isp on/off procedure

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_SLEEP2
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp power switch sleep2

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_SLEEP1
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp power switch sleep1

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_ISOB
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp isolation cell enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp function clock source select: [bit9, bit3, bit2] 0x0 = 416 mhz 0x1 = 499 mhz 0x2 = 624 0x3 = pll4_div4 0x4 = pll5_div3 0x5= pll5_div5 0x6 = pll2_div4 0x7 = pll3_div3

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_CLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp function clk fc request 1 = triggers a frequency change this field is hardware cleared when the frequency change is done.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp function clock divide ratio isp_clk = isp_clk_div / (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_AXI_RESETN
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp axi resetn 0 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp function clock enable 1 = clock enabled 0 = clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: ISP_CLK_RSTN
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp function clock reset 0 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: MP_PMU_CLK_EN_CTRL_MODE
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable controlled by sw register bit <mp_pmu_clk_sw_en> 0 = clock enable controlled by hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_391
spirit:field.spirit:description: reserved for future use

spirit:field.spirit:name: SYS_ACLK_SW_EN

spirit:field.spirit:name: SYS_ACLK_EN_CTRL_MODE
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = clock enable controlled by sw register bit <sys_aclk_sw_en> 0 = clock enable controlled by hardware dynamic gating

spirit:field.spirit:name: FC_SM_REF_CLK_SW_EN

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_LCD_CLK_RES_CTRL1
spirit:register.spirit:description: LCD Clock/Reset Control Register1

spirit:field.spirit:name: MIPI_BIT_CLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: mipi bit clk fc request write 1 to trigger a frequency change. this field is hardware cleared when the frequency change completes.

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_PXCLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd pxclk fc request write 1 to trigger a frequency change. this field is hardware cleared when the frequency change completes.

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_MCLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd mclk fc request write 1 to trigger a frequency change. this field is hardware cleared when the frequency change completes.

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_ACLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd aclk fc request write 1 to trigger a frequency change. this field is hardware cleared when the frequency change completes.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_HW_MODE407
spirit:field.spirit:description: hardware control mode for lcd power up and power down

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_SLEEP2
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd power switch sleep2

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_SLEEP1
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd power switch sleep1

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_ISOB
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd isolation wrapper 0 = enable isolation (lcd powr-down mode) 1 = disable isolation (lcd active mode)

spirit:field.spirit:name: MIPI_BIT_BLANK_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: mipi bit clk fc wait blank signal mask 0 wait lcd blank signal 1 not wait lcd blank signal

spirit:field.spirit:name: MIPI_BIT_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: mipi bit clk clock select 0x0 = 832mhz mhz 0x1 = 624mhz 0x2 = pll5_div2 0x3 = pll3_div2 0x4 =1248 0x5 = 499 0x6 = pll4_div2 0x7 = pll3_div3

spirit:field.spirit:name: MIPI_BIT_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: mipi bit clock divide ratio mipi_bit_clk = clock source/ (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: MIPI_BIT_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: mipi bit clk enable 0x0 = disable 0x1 =enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: MIPI_BIT_CLK_RST
spirit:field.spirit:description: mipi bit clk reset 0x0 = reset 0x1 = no reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_ACLK_BLANK_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd aclk fc wait blank signal mask 0 wait lcd blank signal 1 not wait lcd blank signal

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_ACLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd axi clock select 0x0 = 416 mhz 0x1 = 499 mhz 0x2 = 624 clock 0x3 = pll5_div2

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_ACLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd axi clock divide ratio lcd_aclk = clock source / (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_ACLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd axi enable 0x0 = disable 0x1 =enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_ACLK_QCHAN_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd axi q-channel mask 0 = not mask, q-channel enable 1 mask, q-channel disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_HCLK_SWAP_CTRL
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd hclk swap this field is used to control the hclk source of lcd in d1p mode. 0x0 = system fabric clock for lcd hclk source in d1p mode 0x1 = bypass vctxo clock for lcdhclk source in d1p mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_HCLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: lcd hclk enable 0x0 = disabled 0x1= enabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: LCD_SW_RST

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C1_PLL_SEL

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C0_PLL_SEL

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_PLL_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: comm> pll select 0x0 = pll1 (416 mhz) 0x1 = pll1 (624 mhz) 0x2 = pll2out 0x3= pll1_312 mhz

spirit:field.spirit:name: GPU_AUTO_PWR_ON

spirit:field.spirit:name: MP_PWRDWN1072

spirit:field.spirit:name: MC_CORE_RSTN

spirit:field.spirit:description: 1: drive csysdiscamdrain==1 to memory controller when hwffc 0:

spirit:field.spirit:name: MCK5_HCLK_RST

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMUA_EM_CLK_RES_CTRL
spirit:register.spirit:description: EMMC5.0 Clock/Reset Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_PHY_TMS_SW
spirit:field.spirit:description: em5.0 ephy pad bypass/test mode sw enable 1 = bypass/test mode enable 0 = bypass/test disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_PHY_TOE_SW
spirit:field.spirit:description: test data output select 1 = tdo ports are sampled with fclk (low speed only). 0 = tdo ports are directly from receiver

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_PHY_VREF
spirit:field.spirit:description: sw control the ephy vref port value

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_PHY_V18EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: ephy io 1.8 enable sw control 1 = 1.8v enable 0 = 1.8v disable

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_PHY_LP_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: ephy low power mode sw control 1 = lp mode enable 0 = lp mode disable

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_1248M_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: em5.0 1248 mhz input clock enable 0 = disable em 1248m clock divider clock source 1 = enable em 1248m clock divider clock source

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_1248M_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: emmc5.0 1248 mhz input clock frequency divisor 0x0 to 0x7 = em_1248m_div5 = 1248 m source clock/(em_1248_clk_div + 1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_CLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: when write this bit to 1 will force em_clk_div work, this bit will automatically cleared by hardware when clock switch is done

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: em_clk_div 0-7 = em_clk = em source clock/(em_clk_div + 1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: em clock source select 0 = 416mhz(clk_in_416m_pll1) 1 = 624 mhz(clk_in_pll1_2x) 2=48mhz clock 3=800mhz(clk_in_pll2)

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: em peripheral clock enable 1 = peripheral clock enabled 0 = peripheral clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_AXICLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: em axi clock enable 1 = axi clock enabled 0 = axi clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_RST
spirit:field.spirit:description: em peripheral reset 0 = reset, actually emmc5.0 controller will only use em_axi_rst.

spirit:field.spirit:name: EM_AXI_RST
spirit:field.spirit:description: em axi reset.

spirit:register.spirit:name: TRACE_CONFIG
spirit:register.spirit:description: Trace Clock Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PCLKDBG_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for pclkdbg. pclkdbg = atclk / (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: DBG_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: internal trace clock source select 0x0 = 624 mhz 0x1 = 416 mhz 0x2 = 499mhz 0x3 = 832mhz clock note that the debug clock is generated based on atclk.

spirit:field.spirit:name: SWRST
spirit:field.spirit:description: software reset this field is used to reset all debug logic, low assert

spirit:field.spirit:name: TRACE_CLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: trace clock frequency change request 1 = trace_clk_div forced to work this field is automatically cleared by hardware when clock switch is done

spirit:field.spirit:name: TPIU_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: tpiu clock selection select tpiu use internal clock or external input clock from pad, default will use the clock from internal

spirit:field.spirit:name: TRACE_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: trace clock frequency divisor 0-7 =trace_clk = trace source clock/(trace_clk_div + 1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: TRACE_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: internal trace clock source select 0x0 = 624 mhz 0x1 = 416 mhz 0x2 = 499mhz 0x3 = 832mhz clock

spirit:field.spirit:name: DBG_CLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: debug clock frequency change request 1 = force dbg_clk_div to operate this field is automatically cleared by hardware when clock switch is done

spirit:field.spirit:name: TRACE_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: trace clock enable enable the internal trace clock for tpiu trace output

spirit:field.spirit:name: DBGCLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: debug clock enable (including atclk and pclkdbg) 0 = debug clock disabled 1 = debug clock enabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: ATCLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for atclk atclk = (debug clock selection in trace_config[18:17]) / (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_PSW_MODE1300
spirit:field.spirit:description: power switch mode <var processor: application> core has both big macro power switch and distributed power switch. this field selects different power switch mode. 0x0 = both big macro switches and distributed switches used. during power up – first powe

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_DIS_CORE_L1_SLP1301
spirit:field.spirit:description: disable l1 slp this field is used to disable the core l1 sram power switch sleep power down during core power down mode. 1 = disable core l1 power switch sleep

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_DIS_CORE_SLP1302
spirit:field.spirit:description: disable core slp this field is used to disable the core power switch sleep power down during core power down mode. 1 = disable core power switch sleep

spirit:field.spirit:name: MASK_CLK_OFF_CHECK1304
spirit:field.spirit:description: mask core clock off check during core idle process.

spirit:field.spirit:name: MASK_CLK_STBL_CHECK1305
spirit:field.spirit:description: mask core clock stable check during core wakeup.

spirit:field.spirit:name: MASK_JTAG_IDLE_CHECK1306
spirit:field.spirit:description: mask the jtag idle check during mp idle entry 1 = mask the jtag idle check.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_MASK_CORE_WFI_IDLE_CHECK1307
spirit:field.spirit:description: debug only - it should be 0 during normal operation mask core wfi idle check 1 = status check masked 0 = status check not masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: MASK_GIC_NFIQ_TO_CORE
spirit:field.spirit:description: mask nfiq generated in gic for <var processor: application> core. software can set this bit before core enter c2. apmu hardware will automatically clear this bit when core enter c2

spirit:field.spirit:name: MASK_GIC_NIRQ_TO_CORE
spirit:field.spirit:description: mask nirq generated in gic for <var processor: application> core. software can set this bit before core enter c2. apmu hardware will automatically clear this bit when core enter c2

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_CORE_L1_SRAM_PWRDWN1311
spirit:field.spirit:description: not used. l1 does not support retention

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_CORE_PWRDWN1312
spirit:field.spirit:description: core power down. this bit does not takes effect if core_idle is 0. 1 = when core issue wfi idle, core will go into deep sleep mode and power will be turned off. this bit will not take effect if <var processor: application> dbgnopwrdwn is set

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_CORE_IDLE1313
spirit:field.spirit:description: core idle 1 = when core issue wfi idle, the core clock will be gated externally. this bit will not take effect if <var processor: application> dbgnopwrdwn is set

spirit:field.spirit:description: wakeup core1 if software writes 1 to this field, core 1 is woken up. writes of 0 to this bit and writes to this bit if core 1 is in c0 mode are ignored. this bit is cleared by pmu hardware when core3 exits c1/c2 mode.

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_DVC_DFC_DEBUG
spirit:register.spirit:description: PMU DVC and DFC Debug Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: GLB_INT_MASK_USE_OLD_LOGIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap global interrupt mask use old logic 0x1=use old logic

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_HW_DVC_EN_FOR_FAST_WAKEUP
spirit:field.spirit:description: enable hw-dvc or not if ap interrupt is already pending before ap low power entry 0x0 = ap low power mode will not trigger hw-dvc if ap interrupt is already pending before ap low power entry 0x1 = ap low power mode will trigger hw-dvc even if ap interrupt is already pending before ap low power entry

spirit:field.spirit:name: APSUB_DFC_CHECK_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: dfc check mask in ap subsystem pmu state machine 0 = dfc status check enabled 1 = dfc status check masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: MP_DVC_CHECK_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: dvc check mask in dragon mp subsystem pmu state machine 0 = dfc status check enabled 1 = dfc status check masked

spirit:field.spirit:description: xm4 iop clock divide ratio

spirit:field.spirit:name: AFBC_DEC_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: afbc decoder function clock enable 1 = clock enabled 0 = clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: AFBC_ENC_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: afbc encoder function clock enable 1 = clock enabled 0 = clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSP_CLK_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: vsp function clk fc request 1 = triggers a frequency change this field is hardware cleared when the frequency change is done.

spirit:field.spirit:name: XM4_OCEM_RSTN
spirit:field.spirit:description: xm4 ocem clock reset 0 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: XM4_GLB_RSTN
spirit:field.spirit:description: xm4 global clock reset 0 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: XM4_SYS_RSTN
spirit:field.spirit:description: xm4 system clock reset 0 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: XM4_CORE_RSTN
spirit:field.spirit:description: xm4 core clock reset 0 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSP_CLK_RSTN
spirit:field.spirit:description: vsp function clock reset 0 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSP_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: vsp function clock enable 1 = clock enabled 0 = clock disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSP_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: isp function clock source select 0x0 = 624mhz 0x1 = 499 mhz 0x2 = 832mhz 0x3 = pll3_div2 0x4 = pll3_div3 0x5 = pll3_div4 0x6 = pll2_div4 0x7 = pll4_div3

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSP_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: vsp function clock divide ratio vsp_clk = vsp_clk_div / (this field +1)

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_AUDIO_CLK_RES_CTRL
spirit:register.spirit:description: Audio Clock Reset Enable Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_SD_STATUS
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio sd domain status 1 audio pmu is in power on status ; 0=audio pmu is power off status

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_FUSE_LOAD_START
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio fuse load start. note that when audio fuse loading finishes, this field is automatically cleared by hardware logic. 0x0 = don't trigger audio fuse loading or fuse loading has finished 0x1 = trigger audio fuse loading

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_FUSE_LOAD_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio fuse load mask, only used when audio uses hw power mode 0x0 = no mask 0x1 = mask fuse load operation.

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_POWER_CTL_AUDIO_AUTHO
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap power control audio authority 0=ap can control audio power now 1: ap can't control audio power

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_HW_MODE
spirit:field.spirit:description: hardware control mode for audio power up and down

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_SLEEP2
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio power switch sleep2

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_SLEEP1
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio power switch sleep1

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_ISOB
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio isolation control 0x0 = enable isolation (audio powr-down mode) 0x1 = disable isolation (audio active mode)

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_PWR_STATUS
spirit:field.spirit:description: power status for audio island 1 = audio island is power off 0 = audio island is power on

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_APB_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider for apb clock in audio island apb_clk =aud_clk/(audio_apb_div+1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_AXI_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider for apb clock in audio island axi_clk = aud_clk/(audio_axi_div+1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio island main clock fc request 1 = triggers a frequency change this field is hardware cleared when the frequency change is done.

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_CLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio clcok enable 1 = enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_HW_CKG_BYPASS
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio always on domain reset, this bit should be always set to 1 after the silicon power up

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_CLK_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock sel control for audio main clock 0= pll 312m 1= pll 416m 2= pll 499m 3 = pll7_div2 4 = pll7_div3 5 = pll7_div4 6 = pll7_div5

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider control for audio main clock audio main clk = selected clk/(audio_clk_div+1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_APMU_RESET
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio apmu reset, this bit should be always set to 1 after the silicon power up

spirit:field.spirit:name: TL421_EXT_CORE_RESET
spirit:field.spirit:description: tl421 ext_core_rst 0 = reset 1 = release reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: TL421_ORESET
spirit:field.spirit:description: tl421 orst 0 = reset 1 = release reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: AUDIO_SYS_RESET
spirit:field.spirit:description: audio island system reset 0 = reset 1 = release reset

spirit:register.spirit:name: DFC_AP
spirit:register.spirit:description: <var Processor: Application MP> DCLK Dynamic Freq Change Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_FL1417
spirit:field.spirit:description: dclk freq level in active mode required freq level by <var processor: application mp> in active mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_DFC_REQ1418
spirit:field.spirit:description: dclk hfc request in active mode dclk hfc request for <var processor: application mp> in active mode software can write 1 to this bit to trigger a dclk hfc request. hardware will automatically clear this bit when hfc is done. writes of 0 to this bit are ignored.

spirit:register.spirit:name: DFC_STATUS
spirit:register.spirit:description: DCLK Hardware Freq Change Status Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_DFC_CAUSE1426
spirit:field.spirit:description: dclk dfc cause this field is the cause of the current ongoing dfc. it is only valid when the <dclk_dfc_status> field is 1. 0x1 = <var processor: application mp> triggered dfc 0x2 = <var processor: comm> triggered dfc in active mode 0x4 = msa trigged dfc in active mode 0x8 = gnss triggered dfc in active mode others = low power mode entry/exit triggered dfc

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_TFL1427
spirit:field.spirit:description: target freq level of dclk

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_CFL1428
spirit:field.spirit:description: current freq level of dclk

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_DFC_STATUS1429
spirit:field.spirit:description: dclk dfc status the dclk dfc may be triggered in active state or <var processor: comm>/msa entering low power mode. 0 = there is no dfc or dfc has finished 1 = dfc is in progress

spirit:field.spirit:name: 4X_CLK_MODE1441

spirit:register.spirit:name: PMU_CCI_CLK_CTRL
spirit:register.spirit:description: CCI550 Clock Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_1865
spirit:field.spirit:description: reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: MASK_DRAGON_ADB400_CCI_SIDE_IDLE
spirit:field.spirit:description: mask dragon adb400 cci side idle flag for cci_idle_clk_off_req 1=mask 0=unmask

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCI_CLK_SMOOTH_MUX_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: cci clock smoothmux disable 0= cci clock smoothmux enable, it will hw switch to vcxo clock when cpu enters m2 and gpu shutdonw 1=cci clock smoothmux disable, it only selects the clock from cci_clock_gen, when cpu enters m2 and gpu shutdonw, the cci clock is gated.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCI_CLKEN_BY_INT_AP
spirit:field.spirit:description: cci clock also can be enabled by sys_int_ap[127:0] 0x1=enable this function. if this bit is 0x0, then the cci clock is still only controlled by the status of cpu clusters and gpu

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCI550_CLKGEN_AUTO_CG_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: cci550 clock generator working clock automatic gating control 0x0 = cci550 clock generator working clock automatic gating is disabled and the clock is free-runing 0x1 = cci550 clock generator working clock automatic gating is enabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCI550_FC_REQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: cci550 freq change request. when frequency change is done, this bit is automaticlly cleared by hardware

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_1871
spirit:field.spirit:description: reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCI550_BIU_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for cci550 axi_m0 port to fabric. aclk_m0 = aclkm1/ (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_1873
spirit:field.spirit:description: reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCI550_MC_CLK_DIV
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider selection for cci550 axi_m1 port to mck. aclk_m1 = pll_source / (this field +1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_1875
spirit:field.spirit:description: reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCI550_PLLSEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> cci550 clock selection 0x0 = pll1_499mhz 0x1 = pll1 624mhz 0x2 = pll1_832 mhz 0x3 = pll3_div3（700m） 0x4=pll2_div4(600m) 0x5=pll3_div4(525m) 0x6=pll4_div3(335m) 0x7=pll3_div2(1050m)

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_CORE9_C2
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core9 in c2 mode indication this field is used to indicate whether or not <var processor: application> core9 is in c2 mode. 1 = <var processor: application> core9 is in c2 mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_CORE9_C1
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core1 in c9 mode indication this field is used to indicate whether or not <var processor: application> core9 is in c1 mode. 1 = <var processor: application> core9 is in c1 mode (here c1 means external idle mode)

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_CORE9_WFI_FLAG
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core9 wfi flag this field reflects the wfi flag that is generated by core1. when core9 enters wfi, this field will be set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_CORE8_C2
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core8 in c2 mode indication this field is used to indicate whether or not <var processor: application> core8 is in c2 mode. 1 = <var processor: application> core8 is in c2 mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_CORE8_C1

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_CORE8_WFI_FLAG

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C2_MPSUB_M2

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C2_MPSUB_IDLE_FLAG
